articles.title: Diabetes problem makes Africa more vulernable to COVID-19 death, says WHO - FX Empire
articles.description: By George Obulutsa NAIROBI (Reuters) -   Death rates from COVID-19 infections are much higher in patients with diabetes in Africa, where the number of people with diabetes is growing rapidly, the World Health Organization said on Thursday.
articles.content:
A WHO analysis of data from 13 African countries found a 10.2% case fatality rate in COVID-19 patients with diabetes, compared with 2.5% for COVID-19 patients overall.
